article: Hello! My name is Le Yangyang. Look! Here is a nice photo. What are these in the photo? Oh, they are five lovely goats . Are they brothers and sisters? No. They are good friends. This is A Xiang. He is in blue. A He is in black. And this is A Ru. She is in red. That is A Yi. She is in green. Who is the tall goat? Ha! Ha! It's me. What color am I in? Oh, I'm in yellow. We are the mascots of Guangzhou Asian Games. Welcome to Guangzhou to meet us!
